entry.summary: A new idea has been posted on the Bitcointalk forum, which may be of interest to some readers. The author does not provide any further information about the content of the thread or the idea itself. It is unclear what the topic of discussion is or how it relates to Bitcoin or cryptocurrency. However, interested individuals can follow the provided link to the Bitcointalk forum thread and read through the conversation to gain a better understanding of the concept. The forum thread appears to be active, with multiple users contributing their thoughts and opinions on the idea. Overall, while the details of the idea are unknown, it may still be worth checking out for those curious about new concepts related to Bitcoin and cryptocurrency.
